page.title: 09Education around Bramley.
page.content: We have a number of{play groups}in our area.They take children from 2.5 to 4 years of age. There is{1 Nursery school}which takes 40 children (from 3.5 to 5 years);half of them come in the morning, and half in the afternoon. There are{4 Primary Schools}with a total of 813 children attending. {Bramley Sunnyside}was built in 1930 as a through school.It is now supported by a seperate Infant school on site, and 2 further J+I schools in the village. { Wickersley Comprehensive,}(11 to 18), has 1658 pupils in 1985. On its campus is a{Hearing Impaired unit,}for deaf children.About 70 children go there. In{Maltby Hilltop Special School there are 73 pupils who are mentally handicapped.They go there every day on special buses.
